component.name: Commando
component.summary: A GNOME application for saving and running user-defined Linux commands

description.p: Commando is a GNOME application that allows you to save and quickly execute your frequently used Linux commands. Organize commands with customizable cards featuring icons, colors, tags, and categories.

ul.li: Save and organize commands with customizable cards
Quick execution via speed dial (type number + Enter)
Web view for documentation and web pages
Light, dark, and system theme support
